basic.description: This course is designed to prepare students to effectively coordinate mental health care of clients in primary care, DNP's must be knowledgeable about various treatment modalities; their availability, cost and effectiveness. This elective seminar explores treatment modalities that may be appropriate for clients who present in primary care settings, with mental health concerns.
basic.subject: NGR
basic.title: Mental Health Care Coordination in Primary Care

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Admission to the DNP-FNP Program.
